document_data.mainbody: '''Iorn Ludwakazar''' ({{Pronounce|eye|ORN|_|lud|WAK|ah|zah|refs={{Cite adventurers league/Mayhem in the Earthspur Mines|36}}}}) was a [[dwarf]] king of the [[Ludwakazar]] clan in the [[Earthspur Mountains]].
document_data.Personality: Iorn was a shrewd but stubborn ruler. With death near, he understood the futility of his sibling feud and he yearned to reconcile with his brother.
